regex.name: getsxtream
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36

regex.name: page
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/swhd.php?url=http://iptv-blue.mine.nu/fwtv/65f7358b813048a0898f5677e1793cf9.m3u8'): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/swhdjw.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

item.title: http://www.mivo.com/#/live/sctv
item.link: plugin://plugin.video.f4mTester/?streamtype=HLS&url=$doregex[encodedurl]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36&Accept-Encoding=gzip&Referer=http://www.mivo.com/

regex.name: get-hls
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re
headers0 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36'} url0= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels' source0= requests.get(url0, headers=headers0) m3u8= re.findall('sctv","dataUrl":"(.*?)"', source0.text)[0]
headers1 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36', 'Authorization': 'otBp3oYTBjo-LUCQY7s9Bb0y2CEW0jj4'} url1= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels/wms-auth' source1= requests.get(url1, headers=headers1) wms_auth= re.findall('"sign":"(.*?)"', source1.text)[0] url2 = m3u8 + wms_auth source2= requests.get(url2, headers=headers0) maxbitrate= re.findall('(http.*)', source2.text)[0]
return maxbitrate

regex.name: get-hls
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re
headers0 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36'} url0= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels' source0= requests.get(url0, headers=headers0) m3u8= re.findall('antv","dataUrl":"(.*?)"', source0.text)[0]
headers1 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36', 'Authorization': 'otBp3oYTBjo-LUCQY7s9Bb0y2CEW0jj4'} url1= 'http://api.mivo.com/v4/web/channels/wms-auth' source1= requests.get(url1, headers=headers1) wms_auth= re.findall('"sign":"(.*?)"', source1.text)[0] url2 = m3u8 + wms_auth source2= requests.get(url2, headers=headers0) maxbitrate= re.findall('(http.*)', source2.text)[0]
return maxbitrate
